EmailTemplate.subject: Improve Your Health
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-sit-stand-workstation.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Improve your physical and mental health by introducing sit-stand workstations so employees can easily switch between sitting and standing positions throughout the day. <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-sit-stand-workstation.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Learn More <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-sit-stand-workstation.aspx?cmp=EBBSBLOGMAY19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> I Want to Shop <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=EBBSMAY19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
